Articles.Content:
KEY:

BL- Before Launch

AL- After Launch

58 million BL - Kerm Tree seed pods gain ability to move to spread trees around Kerbin.

33,000 BL - Kerm Tree seed pods achieve sentience, calling themselves Kerbals.

2,000 BL - First Kerbal society is formed in the Kermina Valley.

1950 BL - First records of Kerbal language.

1800 BL - Kerbals discover the Mun when a Kerbal trips over a rock while hunting Kroacs.

1745 BL - Kuppern Empire is formed, with it's center in the Kermina Valley.

1625 BL - Gallipa Kerman invents the telescope, Minmus is discovered.

1600 BL - Kenbol Kerman invents a better telescope with lenses. Duna, Eve, and Jool are discovered.

1598 BL - Kenbol Kerman is blinded after discovering Moho.

1341 BL - The continent of Kemika is discovered by Comulo Kerman.

1200 BL - The firework is discovered by a Kemikan scientist. Scientist then attaches a wing to it and invents the missile.

1130 BL - Great War between Kemikan Federation and Keppurn empire.

1000 BL - Quapin Empire is united by Emperor Libec Kerman II

466 BL - Emperor Libec Kerman XVII is assassinated by a Kemikan dissident.

300 BL - Rise of modern Kerbal social system.

248 BL - Kemikan Federation annexes Kuppern.

247 BL - Quapin Empire invades Kemikan Federation. Second Kerbal War begins.

230 BL - Second Kerbal War ends. Kerbin united into the Kerbal Federation.

180 BL - Eldnire Kebbol III discovers Eeloo.

134 BL - Embrie Kebbol discovers the SRB. Used to roast Snakk Tree fruit.

60 BL - Bad Time begins.

34 BL - Bad Time ends. Kechan order formed to maintain law and justice.

1 BL - The Highest Kouncil authorizes a space program.

0 AL - First rocket, Kerbal I, launched.

1 AL - Jebidiah Kerman achieves orbit, but dies after a parachute accident.

3 AL - Alby Kebwit lands on Minmus

4 AL - Great Expansion. Hyperion probes sent to Laythe, Duna, and Eve.

5 AL - Famous writer Sigly Kermol lands Prometheus Eve on Eve.

8 AL - Second Expansion. Krios flyby vessels set to Duna and Jool, piloted by Druemont and Adley Kerman.

9 AL - Hyperion Vall disaster.

10 AL - Khoine base established on Minmus.

11 AL - Hyperion Eeloo launched to Eeloo, arrival pending.

Edited March 24, 2014 by Poryy
Why are the years after 0 not AL?

Why are the years after 0 not AL?

*Facepalm*

I swear I'm intelligent.
